Name: Green Fizz
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda.
Review: Fresh, cleansing and refreshing - as only a minty Fizz can be.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Fizz contains 200 calories
